home.subtitle: Learn about food while having fun!
home.challenge_text: Earn 10 points by trying a vegetable you've never had before!

voice_bot.title: EatXP Voice Assistant
voice_bot.help_text: Ask me anything about food, recipes, or nutrition!

teen_features.missions_desc: Complete tasks to power up your character

voice_responses.apple: Apples are full of fiber and vitamin C! They help keep your teeth healthy and give you energy.
voice_responses.banana: Bananas have potassium which helps your muscles and heart! They're also great for energy.
voice_responses.carrot: Carrots have beta-carotene which is great for your eyes! Orange veggies are super healthy.
voice_responses.broccoli: Broccoli is full of vitamins and minerals! It helps your bones grow strong.
voice_responses.spinach: Spinach is packed with iron and vitamins! It makes you strong like Popeye!
voice_responses.milk: Milk has calcium which builds strong bones and teeth! Great for growing kids.
voice_responses.egg: Eggs have protein and choline which help your brain grow! Perfect for breakfast.
voice_responses.fish: Fish has omega-3s which are great for your brain! It helps you think better.
voice_responses.water: Water is super important! It keeps your body cool and helps everything work right.
voice_responses.salad: Salads have lots of veggies with vitamins and minerals! Eating colorful food is healthy.
voice_responses.recipe: I can teach you delicious recipes! Ask me about pizza, pasta, cookies, or any food you like!
voice_responses.cook: Cooking is fun and helps you learn! What food would you like to cook?
voice_responses.healthy: Eating healthy means lots of fruits, veggies, whole grains, and water! It helps your body grow strong.
voice_responses.exercise: Exercise is fun and keeps your body healthy! You can run, dance, swim, or play!
voice_responses.food: Food gives your body energy and helps you grow! Eat lots of colors - veggies, fruits, proteins!
voice_responses.sugar: Sugar gives quick energy but too much isn't good for teeth! Eat sweets in small amounts.
voice_responses.chocolate: Chocolate has some good stuff but also sugar! Have it as a treat, not every day.
voice_responses.pizza: Pizza can be healthy! Use whole wheat crust and lots of veggie toppings!

food_info.carrot_fact: Carrots were first purple, not orange!
food_info.apple_fact: Apples are part of the rose family!

story.chapter_1_narrative: Welcome to Anime Eats Academy! Your food journey starts here. Learn how different foods give your body superpowers!
story.lesson_content: Every food has special powers! Proteins build muscles üí™, Carbs give energy ‚ö°, Fats help your brain üß†, Vitamins keep you healthy üåü

shokuiku_saga.title: Shokuiku Saga RPG
shokuiku_saga.vegetable_valley_desc: Help the farmers save the vegetable crops from decay
shokuiku_saga.protein_peak_desc: Climb the mountain and learn about protein sources
shokuiku_saga.sugar_swamp_desc: Discover why excessive sugar harms your health
shokuiku_saga.hydration_haven_desc: Restore the water kingdom and learn about hydration

did_you_know.title: Did You Know?
did_you_know.honey_fact: Honey never spoils! Archaeologists have found 3000-year-old honey in Egyptian tombs that was still edible.
did_you_know.strawberry_fact: Strawberries aren't actually berries, but bananas are!
did_you_know.carrot_fact: Carrots can help you see better in the dark because they're full of vitamin A.
did_you_know.water_fact: Your brain is about 75% water, so drinking water helps you think better!
did_you_know.breakfast_fact: Eating breakfast helps you do better in school and sports.
did_you_know.veggie_colors_fact: Different colored vegetables have different superpowers for your body!
did_you_know.broccoli_fact: Broccoli has more protein per calorie than steak!

recipes_section.title: Recipe Collection
recipes_section.subtitle: Yummy recipes perfect for your age!

healthy_heroes.title: Healthy Food Heroes
healthy_heroes.subtitle: Discover amazing foods and their superpowers!

badges_achievements.title: Your Badges
badges_achievements.subtitle: Collect badges as you learn and cook!

food_kingdom.title: Food Kingdom Map
food_kingdom.tip_1: Complete story chapters to unlock new regions of the Food Kingdom
food_kingdom.tip_2: Each region has unique recipes and nutrition facts
food_kingdom.tip_3: Collect recipes from all regions to become a Master Chef
food_kingdom.tip_4: Mix and match recipes to create balanced meals
food_kingdom.fruit_forest_desc: A lush forest full of colorful fruits bursting with vitamins and natural sweetness!
food_kingdom.veggie_valley_desc: A bountiful valley filled with vibrant vegetables in every shade of green, orange, and purple!
food_kingdom.protein_peaks_desc: Majestic mountains where protein-rich foods stand tall and strong!
food_kingdom.dairy_dome_desc: A magnificent dome dedicated to all things dairy packed with calcium!
food_kingdom.grain_gardens_desc: Golden fields of grains stretching to the horizon with sustained power!

seasonal_produce.title: üåø Seasonal Produce
seasonal_produce.subtitle: Eat what's fresh and in season!
seasonal_produce.spring_desc: Fresh growth after winter! Enjoy vibrant greens and light vegetables.
seasonal_produce.summer_desc: Peak season! Enjoy colorful fruits and refreshing vegetables.
seasonal_produce.autumn_desc: Harvest time! Enjoy warm, comforting fruits and vegetables.
seasonal_produce.winter_desc: Hearty choices! Root vegetables and citrus keep you healthy.
seasonal_produce.strawberry_fact: Strawberries have their seeds on the outside!
seasonal_produce.asparagus_fact: Asparagus can grow up to 10 inches in a day!
seasonal_produce.peas_fact: Peas were one of the first frozen vegetables!
seasonal_produce.spinach_fact: Spinach contains oxalates that can coat your teeth!
seasonal_produce.tomato_fact: Tomatoes are technically berries, not vegetables!
seasonal_produce.corn_fact: Each corn cob has about 800 kernels!
seasonal_produce.blueberries_fact: Blueberries are the only food that's naturally blue!
seasonal_produce.apple_fact: It takes 36 apples to make one gallon of apple juice!
seasonal_produce.grape_fact: Grapes have been grown for over 8000 years!
seasonal_produce.carrot_fact: Orange carrots weren't popular until the 1600s!
seasonal_produce.potato_fact: Potatoes were the first vegetable to be grown in space!
seasonal_produce.kale_fact: Kale is packed with more nutrients than most vegetables!
